title: Technology and Inquiry-Based Mathematics Pedagogy Design: VR Simulation Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Corporate math education practitioners role-playing as learners, emphasizing collaboration and self-directed inquiry-based learning in BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can design inquiry-based mathematical problems in VR simulation environments and complete implementation at over 80%
Learners can develop learner-tailored mathematical inquiry activities at least three times using digital tools and undergo peer evaluation
Learners can execute feedback loops to improve instructional methods by analyzing formative assessment data at least twice
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
